title: Skins disappearing??
body:
A while ago, someone bought me a lot of skins, out of nowhere. 
But today, all those skins they bought are gone. Is this a weird glitch? 
I checked to see if you can refund gifts and it doesn't let me, and i thought we only have 3 refunds..

Skins:
Infernal Diana
Lunar Goddess Diana
DJ Sona
Frostfire Annie
Deep Sea Nami
Omega Squad Teemo
Dragon Slayer Lulu
Dark Star Ward

There may have been more, but i can't think of them right now. 


IGN: AlbinoPug
Region: North America

If you need more information, i'm always available. 
I don't know how to show evidence of these gifts, but i have friends who were there when i was using them.
Or, maybe there's a way to watch my old matches? 
I just don't like the way someone can easily just refund gifts, if that's what really happened..

replies.body: Due to the nature of sensitive account information, we'd like to help with your specific issue individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Hit us up on there, and we'd be happy to take a look!
It sounds like your friend may have a chargeback on their account so it lead to these gifts getting removed.
